TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit EncoderParameter extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class EncoderParameter Implements IDisposable
public ref class EncoderParameter sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 用於將值或值的陣列傳遞至影像編碼器。

span.span: Used to pass a value, or an array of values, to an image encoder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以使用接收支援特定的影像編碼器的特定參數的可能值的清單物件。You can also use an object to receive a list of possible values supported by a particular parameter of a particular image encoder. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用建構函式。The following code example demonstrates how to create a using the constructor. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`VaryQualityLevel`從表單的建構函式的方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call the `VaryQualityLevel` method from the form's constructor. 這個範例需要名為的映像檔`TestPhoto.jpg`位於**c:\\**。This example requires an image file named `TestPhoto.jpg` located at **c:\\**. [!code-csharp[UsingImageEncodersDecoders#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/UsingImageEncodersDecoders/CS/Form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[UsingImageEncodersDecoders#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/UsingImageEncodersDecoders/VB/Form1.vb#8)] [!code-csharp[UsingImageEncodersDecoders#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/UsingImageEncodersDecoders/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[UsingImageEncodersDecoders#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/UsingImageEncodersDecoders/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

param.span: 32 位元整數，表示分數的分子。

span.span: A 32-bit integer that represents the numerator of a fraction.

param.span: 不可為負值。

span.span: Must be nonnegative.

param.name: denominator
param.span: 32 位元整數，表示分數的分母。

span.span: A 32-bit integer that represents the denominator of a fraction.

param.span: 不可為負值。

span.span: Must be nonnegative.

summary.span: 這組整數表示分數，第一個整數為分子，第二個整數為分母。

span.span: The pair of integers represents a fraction, the first integer being the numerator, and the second integer being the denominator.

span.span: Sets the property to , and sets the property to 1.

param.name: encoder
param.span: 物件，會封裝參數類別目錄的全域唯一識別碼。

span.span: An object that encapsulates the globally unique identifier of the parameter category.

param.name: numerator
param.span: 32 位元整數的陣列，指定分數的分子。

span.span: An array of 32-bit integers that specifies the numerators of the fractions.

param.span: 陣列中的整數不可為負值。

span.span: The integers in the array must be nonnegative.

param.name: denominator
param.span: 32 位元整數的陣列，指定分數的分母。

span.span: An array of 32-bit integers that specifies the denominators of the fractions.

param.span: 陣列中的整數不可為負值。

span.span: The integers in the array must be nonnegative.

param.span: 指定索引的分母和相同索引的分子相配對。

span.span: A denominator of a given index is paired with the numerator of the same index.

summary.span: 使用指定的 物件和兩個 32 位元整數的陣列，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified object and two arrays of 32-bit integers.

summary.span: 這兩個陣列表示分數的陣列。

span.span: The two arrays represent an array of fractions.

summary.span: 設定 屬性為 ，並設定 屬性為 陣列中的元素數目，這個數目必須和 陣列中的元素數目相同。

span.span: Sets the property to , and sets the property to the number of elements in the array, which must be the same as the number of elements in the array.

span.span: The pair of integers represents a range of integers, the first integer being the smallest number in the range, and the second integer being the largest number in the range.

param.name: encoder

span.span: An object that encapsulates the globally unique identifier of the parameter category.

param.name: numberValues
param.span: 整數，指定儲存在 物件中的值數目。

span.span: An integer that specifies the number of values stored in the object.

param.span: 屬性設為這個值。

span.span: The property is set to this value.

param.name: type
param.span: 列舉型別的成員，其指定儲存在 物件中之值的資料型別。

span.span: A member of the enumeration that specifies the data type of the values stored in the object.

param.span: 和 屬性都設定為這個值。

summary.span: 使用指定的 物件、值的數目、值的資料型別和儲存在 物件中值的指標，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified object, number of values, data type of the values, and a pointer to the values stored in the object.

span.span: The four arrays represent an array rational ranges.

summary.span: 有理數範圍是從最小分數值到最大分數值的所有分數集合。

span.span: A rational range is the set of all fractions from a minimum fractional value through a maximum fractional value.

summary.span: 設定 屬性為 ，並設定 屬性為 陣列中的元素數目，這個數目必須與其他三個陣列中的元素數目相同。

span.span: Sets the property to , and sets the property to the number of elements in the array, which must be the same as the number of elements in the other three arrays.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第 i 範圍包含從 numerator1 所有小數點的數字 [i] / denominator1 [i] 透過 numerator2 [i] / denominator2 [i]。The ith range consists of all fractional numbers from numerator1[i]/denominator1[i] through numerator2[i]/denominator2[i].
